title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, metallic thread
Technique: cut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: Large-scale floral symmetrical design with undulating flowering branches and leaves clasped by stylized urn. In dark blue-green ridged pile on bright yellow ground now largely discolored to tan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.Medium: silk, linen, metallic thread
Technique: cut supplementary warp pile (velvet). 1953-216-3.
